ai-kv18.3:1.1_0: For the Buddha’s teaching is compassionate,
ai-kv18.3:1.3_0: there is no-one of the Buddha,
ai-kv18.3:1.4_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv18.3:1.5_0: For the Buddha’s teaching is compassionate,
ai-kv18.3:1.9_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv18.3:2.1_0: There is the Buddha’s instruction to the Buddha.
ai-kv18.3:2.3_0: there is the Buddha’s instruction to the Buddha.
ai-kv18.3:2.4_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv18.3:2.8_0: there is the Buddha’s instruction to the Buddha.
ai-kv18.3:2.9_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv18.3:3.1_0: For the Buddha’s teaching is compassionate,
ai-kv18.3:3.3_0: The Buddha is doing what he says.
ai-kv18.3:3.4_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv18.3:3.5_0: Does he not constantly look to the world with its compassion for the world?
ai-kv18.3:3.7_0: And the Buddha spoke of the world, compassionately, to us. He had surely benefited the world, thinking: ‘Our teacher, you should surely be told me.’
ai-kv18.3:4.1_0: For the Buddha’s teaching is compassionate,
ai-kv18.3:4.3_0: The Buddha doesn’t attainment of the Great Steward’s attainment.
ai-kv18.3:4.5_0: And he said to hold Mahākappina,
ai-kv18.3:4.6_0: “No, the Buddha has no compassion for him.”
ai-kv18.3:5.1_0: there is the Buddha’s instruction to the Buddha.
ai-kv18.3:5.4_0: because you have not conducted himself properly;
ai-kv18.3:5.5_0: For that is the Buddha’s compassion,
ai-kv18.3:5.6_0: The account of the compassion is finished.
